TopicTitle: We Have To Cook! (Walt and Jesse textures) [Kind-of-WIP. Not a mod in itself.]

Articles.Content:
I'm not really sure if this is the right place to put this, it's not an Add-On itself, but it's to do with an existing Add-On. 

So I was messing around a bit with the textures from [TextureReplacer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-2-5-%2830-1-2015%29) and I thought I could give two Kerbals a head skin that would look at least a bit like Jesse and Walter from Breaking Bad. With the plan to stick them up in a space station. 

(By the way, I checked the license before actually doing this, it's under the terms of the [MIT Licence](https://github.com/ducakar/TextureReplacer#licence).)

> 
> ![Screen-Shot-2013-09-03-at-12.28.47-PM.png](http://wp.patheos.com.s3.amazonaws.com/blogs/tinseltalk/files/2013/09/Screen-Shot-2013-09-03-at-12.28.47-PM.png)
> 
> ![0927_Walter_White_cog1.jpg](http://s3.amazonaws.com/media.wbur.org/wordpress/16/files/2013/09/0927_Walter_White_cog1.jpg)

I ended up with these:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/v9Z05)

Considering it's my first time working with textures, I don't think I've done too badly.

> 
> ![g7kAqTx.png](http://i.imgur.com/g7kAqTx.png)
> 
> ![rkCUEQc.png](http://i.imgur.com/rkCUEQc.png)
